short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Twitter Threads into beautiful slideshows. A new way to feed your Instagram and Linkedin accounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a new button to Twitter threads. This button opens a thread slideshow designer where you can export to pdf and images.

How to get started:
1. Install this extension
2. Proceed to a Twitter thread
3. Click Thread designer
4. Start designing your slideshow ðŸŽ‰
